title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 450.2 - Fees for searches and copies of records and reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 450.2 - Fees for searches and copies of records and reports

State Regulations
(a) Fee for searches. The fee for a search
shall be 50 cents multiplied by the number of files necessarily searched, the
number of names or numbers against which the search is made and the number of
documents for which the search is made. If a certificate showing the result of
a search is required, there shall be an additional fee of 50 cents. (b) Fees for copies of records and reports. The fees for copies of records and reports, other than accident reports, shall
be as follows: photostatic copies, $1 per page; accident report, $3.50. If
certification of a record or report is required, there shall be an additional
fee of 50 cents. Notes

450.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
